body:
## üíé $200 bounty [‚Ä¢ Gitea](https://algora.io/go-gitea)
### Steps to solve:
1. **Start working**: Comment `/attempt #32257` with your implementation plan
2. **Submit work**: Create a pull request including `/claim #32257` in the PR body to claim the bounty
3. **Receive payment**: 100% of the bounty is received 2-5 days post-reward. [Make sure you are eligible for payouts](https://algora.io/docs/payments#supported-countries-regions)

### ‚ùó Important guidelines:
- To claim a bounty, you need to **provide a short demo video** of your changes in your pull request
- If anything is unclear, **ask for clarification** before starting as this will help avoid potential rework
- Low quality AI PRs will not receive review and will be closed
- Do not ask to be assigned unless you've contributed before

Thank you for contributing to go-gitea/gitea!

issue.title: Allow comments on non-diff files

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
### Feature Description

Similar request to #32257, but broadening the scope to also be able to comment on unchanged files.

Sometimes the reviewer may notice that a change is required in some other location in another file that is not yet patched by the current pull request.

### Screenshots

_No response_
